concept.title: Automated Workflow Trigger
concept.shortdesc: The Automated Workflow Trigger enables SecureNova administrators to automatically initiate workflows, such as notifying a team, when specific conditions are met, like a high-priority issue being reported. This feature ensures rapid response and consistent process execution.

conbody.p: The Automated Workflow Trigger is a powerful feature in SecureNova that allows administrators to configure workflows to start automatically when specific conditions are met, such as a new incident with a "High" priority or a change request in a particular category. By eliminating the need for manual intervention, it enhances efficiency across teams and processes.

li.p: Time Savings: Automates repetitive tasks, freeing administrators to focus on higher-value activities.
Improved Consistency: Ensures workflows are triggered reliably under defined conditions, reducing errors.
Enhanced Responsiveness: Speeds up processes like incident escalation, improving service delivery.
